topic.title: <RibbonTabPage>
topic.p:
A <RibbonTabPage/> is a <TabPage/> with two more properties:
Groups: All <RibbonGroup/> in this <RibbonTabPage/>.
Highlighted: Set to true to highlight the tab header.

Typically, a minmum height is needed for the first tab page like this:
<RibbonTabPage Text="First Page"> <att.ContainerComposition-set PreferredMinSize="y:110"/> </RibbonTabPage>
Alternatively, you could give the same minimum height to all tab pages.
